titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that Parker Dykes deserves to be recognized for his years of commitment to football and his community and is extremely worthy of the award of National Junior College Coach of the Year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 12/6/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that Parker Dykes deserves to be recognized for his years of commitment to football and his community and is extremely worthy of the award of National Junior College Coach of the Year.
